t: r/upsstore on Reddit: What’s the difference between GREEN, BLUE and RED Amazon returns?
s: March 6, 2021 - When it goes red Amazon actually does get and confirm the item before refunding whereas green and blue you get the return fairly quickly after bringing it in. ... Red is not necessarily high value. It is an audit box that they want to verify that the item that is being processed is the actual item returned.
